action.action-desc: Ms. Tokuda (for herself and Mr. Wittman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to eliminate the prohibition on indirect costs with respect to aquaculture assistance, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Promoting American Competition in Aquaculture Research Act.

section.header: Reauthorizing aquaculture assistance programs; treatment of indirect costs

subsection.text: Section 1477(a) of the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3324) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (2), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
$15,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030.

subsection.text: Section 1477 of the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3324) is amended by adding at the end the following:
Effective beginning on the date of the enactment of the Promoting American Competition in Aquaculture Research Act, the limitation with respect to indirect costs—

paragraph.text: under section 1462 shall apply with respect to awards made under this subtitle; and
under section 1473 shall not apply with respect to such awards.
